item.title: League of Legends: Wild Rift (@wildrift) on X 🌄
item.description:
🗣️Rift Report 🗣️
📰Patch 6.2 is right around the corner and bringing a new theme, champs, items, and more! We’re talking about all the new content that’s to come. ⭐Highlighting our creator of the week: Coach Recmeister
https://t.co/RfeP2KrXbv
